SEARCH
Package shapes

Class RegularPolygon

java.lang.Object
alexlewis9.shapes.Shape
alexlewis9.shapes.RegularPolygon
public class RegularPolygon extends Shape
This alexlewis9.shapes.RegularPolygon class represents a double precision Regular Polygon that can be drawn using the Processing library.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class shapes.Shape

    x, y

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RegularPolygon()
    Initializes a default instance of a alexlewis9.shapes.Rectangle object with all dimensions set to zero.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    calcr()
    Calculates the radius of the inscribed circle of the polygon, where the inscribed circle is the circle that can be drawn inside the regular polygon such that it is tangent to every side of the polygon.
    double
    calcR()
    Calculates the radius of the circumscribed circle of the polygon, where the circumscribed circle is the circle that intersects each vertex of the polygon.
    double
    calcVertexAngle()
    Calculates the vertex angle of the polygon.
    void
    draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
    Draws the regular polygon to the given Processing PApplet.
    void
    drawBoundingCircles(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
    Draws the inscribed and circumscribed circles of the polygon to the given Processing PApplet.
    double
    getArea()
    Calculates the area of the polygon.
    int
    getNumSides()
    Returns the number of sides of the polygon.
    double
    getPerimeter()
    Calculates the perimeter of the polygon.
    double
    getSideLength()
    Returns the length of the sides of the polygon.
    boolean
    isPointInside(double x, double y)
    Tests whether the point x, y is contained the bounding circle of this polygon.

  • Method Details

    • calcr

      public double calcr()
      Calculates the radius of the inscribed circle of the polygon, where the inscribed circle is the circle that can be drawn inside the regular polygon such that it is tangent to every side of the polygon.
      Returns:
      The radius of the inscribed circle of the polygon.

    • calcR

      public double calcR()
      Calculates the radius of the circumscribed circle of the polygon, where the circumscribed circle is the circle that intersects each vertex of the polygon.
      Returns:
      The radius of the circumscribed circle of the polygon.

    • draw

      public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws the regular polygon to the given Processing PApplet.
      Overrides:
      draw in class Shape
      Parameters:
      drawer - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the polygon.
      Preconditions:
      The polygon will be drawn with attributes previously set on the given PApplet.
      Postconditions:
      Side effect - marker is set to: marker.stroke(r, g, b), marker.fill(r, g, b)

    • drawBoundingCircles

      public void drawBoundingCircles(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws the inscribed and circumscribed circles of the polygon to the given Processing PApplet.
      Parameters:
      drawer - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the circles.
      Preconditions:
      The circles will be drawn with attributes previously set on the given PApplet.

    • isPointInside

      public boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      Tests whether the point x, y is contained the bounding circle of this polygon.
      Specified by:
      isPointInside in class Shape
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the point.
      y - Y-coordinate of the point.
      Returns:
      true if the point x, y is contained inside this polygon, false otherwise.
